issue.title: [Rust] Fix arrow crate clippy lints
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9979](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9979). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This fixes many clippy lints, but not all. It takes hours to address lints, ansd we can work on remaining ones in future PRs

comments.body:
